name: Dude On Fire
description:
These dudes are literally on fire! You'll need to drive them through alien planets while avoiding mean and meaner traps like giant spikes, flying rocks and burning meteors among others!

KEY FEATURES
* Stunning planets & backgrounds
* Simple but addictive gameplay
* Amusing dudes to collect
* Google Play support

CONTROLS & TIPS
* Swipe up or down anywhere to control your dude
* Unlock all dudes and check out their differences
* Some of the traps are moving and may hit your dude in the face
* Finally, make sure to swipe only if there is a trap ahead or else...

Please rate the game and submit your feedback for further improvements!
